segments.text: I see the water just gushing out of the sink, and it’s already making a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it’s only going to get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s even going to react when she finally sees it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to slip and fall if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole kitchen is going to be ruined by the time she realizes what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in her own little world, completely ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
